channel.title: Geometry on Acanthiza
channel.description: Recent content in Geometry on Acanthiza

item.title: Geometry
item.description: Baffled by bike geometry? So am I, so don’t look for answers here. But here’s how I’ve helped myself scratch the surface of understanding… And began to understand just how much of an outlier my current bike is as a ‘gravel’ bike. The main guides for the important numbers to chase were: this CylingTips article this great resource on gravel bikes covering geometry in part two geometrygeeks.com provides good explanations of each term.
